data.message: Great job teaching kiddie rebels to yell Fuck Trump. You might be a millionaire, but you were born from a whore who did not love you and you will always be a loser who can only rap and not lead or solve any problems in the world. You're a drug addict and you father left you because you are garbage that he molested

replies.message: You have to put down someone out of jealousy don't cry you say all these bad things about him but he still did and is doing better than you

George Carruthers I'm sorry , not everyone looks up to drug addicts with money. My IQ is much superior than this retards. I have multiple Engineering degrees. Including the studies of advanced Mathematics, Thermodynamics and computational programming. I have had a paid off house since my late 20's. There is nothing to be Jealous about from this loser. Maybe if you make better choices for role models you could do better in your life.

Sorry I don't like drug addicts, who think their opinion is important
....but he made it in life , defeating all those challenges he encountered growing up. Whats your issue with Eminem? I think you are the looser here.
